rep.trans: image->[pawn_nameFull] landing in a drop pod [circumstance_phrase].
image->[pawn_nameFull] touching down in a drop pod [circumstance_phrase].
image->[pawn_nameFull] striking earth in a drop pod [circumstance_phrase].
image->[pawn_nameFull] riding in a drop pod [circumstance_phrase].
dropextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] is concentrating intently on the controls.
dropextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] has [pawn_possessive] eyes closed and looks afraid.
dropextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] is unconscious, [pawn_possessive] tongue lolling out, drool dripping.
dropextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] is smiling with grim joy.
image->[pawn_nameFull] spewing vomit onto the ground [circumstance_phrase]. [vomitextrasentence]
image->[pawn_nameFull] looking disgusted while covered with dried vomit [circumstance_phrase]. [vomitextrasentence]
image->[pawn_nameFull] doubled over and retching onto the floor [circumstance_phrase]. [vomitextrasentence]
image->[pawn_nameFull] on [pawn_possessive] knees, vomiting on the floor [circumstance_phrase]. [vomitextrasentence]
vomitextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] seems totally unaware of what is around [pawn_objective].
vomitextrasentence->[pawn_possessive] face itself seems to be swelling.
vomitextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] is nearly unconscious, [pawn_possessive] tongue lolling out, drool dripping.
vomitextrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] is convulsing violently.
image->[pawn_nameFull] staggering around drunk [circumstance_phrase]. [drunk_extrasentence]
image->[pawn_nameFull] tilting [pawn_possessive] head back and guzzling liquor [circumstance_phrase]. [drunk_extrasentence]
image->[pawn_nameFull] greedily collecting bottles of liquor [circumstance_phrase]. [drunk_extrasentence]
image->[pawn_nameFull] drinking heavily [circumstance_phrase]. [drunk_extrasentence]
drunk_extrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] seems totally unaware of what is around [pawn_objective].
drunk_extrasentence->[pawn_possessive] face itself seems to be swelling.
drunk_extrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] is nearly unconscious, [pawn_possessive] tongue lolling out, drool dripping.
drunk_extrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] looks happy and sad at the same time.
drunk_extrasentence->[pawn_pronoun] has stains down [pawn_possessive] front.
drunk_extrasentence->There is a trail of discarded beverage containers being [pawn_objective].
image->[pawn_nameFull], wie [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] verzweifelt versucht das Feuer auszuschlagen, dass sich an [pawn_possessive] Körper festgebissen hat. [onfire_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull] [circumstance_phrase] in Flammen eingehüllt. [onfire_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull], wie [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] am Boden kniend, die Hände über dem Kopf, versucht, die Flammen an [pawn_possessive]em Körper zu ersticken. [onfire_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull] [circumstance_phrase], brennend über den Boden rollend. [onfire_extra]
onfire_extra->[pawn_possessive] Fleisch ist offensichtlich verkohlt.
onfire_extra->[pawn_possessive] Augen sind panisch geweitet.
onfire_extra->[pawn_pronoun] scheint kaum bei Bewußtsein zu sein; [pawn_possessive] Augen sind leblos.
onfire_extra->[pawn_possessive] Mund ist geöffnet als schreie [pawn_pronoun] noch immer um Hilfe.
image->[pawn_nameFull], wie [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] in rasende Wut verfällt. [psychotic_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull], als [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] durchdreht und gewalttätig wird. [psychotic_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull], wie [pawn_pronoun] sich [circumstance_phrase] mit einem irren Blick auf [pawn_possessive]em Gesicht auf jemanden stürzt. [psychotic_extra]
psychotic_extra->Dabei schüttelt [pawn_pronoun] sich vor unbändiger Wut.
psychotic_extra->[pawn_possessive]e Zähne sind zu einem tötlichen Knurren gefletscht.
psychotic_extra->[pawn_possessive]e Augen sind tote Höhlen des Wahnsinns.
psychotic_extra->Spucke fliegt aus [pawn_possessive]em Mund, als er [pawn_possessive]e wahnsinnige Wut hinausschreit.
image->[pawn_nameFull], als [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] an dem Stress zerbricht und aufgibt. [gaveup_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull], wie [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] zusammenbricht und unkontrolliert weint. [gaveup_extra]
image->[pawn_nameFull], wie [pawn_pronoun] [circumstance_phrase] mit einem verlorenen Ausdruck auf [pawn_possessive]em Gesicht durch die Gegend stolpert. [gaveup_extra]
gaveup_extra->[pawn_pronoun] hat Tränen über [pawn_possessive] Gesicht ströhmen.
gaveup_extra->[pawn_pronoun] lacht aus den tiefsten Tiefen [pawn_possessive]er Depression.
gaveup_extra->[pawn_nameShortDefinite] schaut Hilfe suchend gen Himmel.
gaveup_extra->[pawn_pronoun] zerreißt [pawn_possessive]e eigene Kleidung.
